name: KoKó Chicken
description:
Help Kokó the Chicken search for his lost eggs while his home in Mad City  is being destroyed.

 Find a new home and save your eggs!

Features: 

  • 3D puzzles  with isometric perspective.
  • You are a chicken with a tie! Cool!
  • Six playable levels.
  • Little puzzle game made in under 43 hours for ZJam'21.

Credits:

Sound and Music Design : Marina Picaporte (https://www.compotacustico.com/)

Programming: Eduardo Hombrados

3DModelling: Álvaro Jiménez

Game Design : Alberto Roldán (https://twitter.com/Rainor85)
